title: CM condemns explosion on railway track near Kot Sultan
content:
KARACHI, Oct 07 (APP):Sindh Chief Minister (CM) Syed Murad Ali Shah has strongly condemned an explosion on the railway track near Kot Sultan on Tuesday.
He directed the IG Police to provide a complete report of the incident.
The CM also directed the Commissioner of Larkana to provide the best medical treatment to the injured passengers.
He said that timely assistance should be provided to the affected passengers by sending rescue teams.
